Assorted Cards (Pages 23 & 24 In The Book)

By Anonymous on Tuesday, June 26, 2001 - 05:48 pm:

card namegutsa.m./brespe/enveffect
Powder0brespetake one life pt and draw one card
Nuts Oil2brespeuse with monster who has already attacked. allows it to attack again.
Pride2breenvmixbreed monsters cant use any dodge moves against pure breeds
Awe3breenvincreases by one guts to use a card
Ensnare3breenvall monsters may not use special moves
Lock Tight3breenvif damage is 4 or higher pow or int moves become unavailable
Bad Weather3breenvall monster's features become ground
Arid Land4breenvat end of attack all monsters on the attack side lose 1 life point.
Blow Away0a.m.spemakes an opponent's monster unable to attack next turn
Concentrate1a.m.speand dge or blk move using 0 guts cannot be used if this is used with either pow or int move.
Persistence1a.m.blkpow or int moves that lower guts will not be effective
Support0brespeuse this with breeder card that uses 3 or less guts. that move is now available for 0 guts.
Complicated1brespemakes opponent's monster unable to attack next turn
Fake Cry1brespeopponent loses 1 guts
Refresh1brespediscard all cards and redraw
Pray0breblkwhen opponent uses env card this blocks its effects
Spark2breenvadds 1 damage point to int attacks
Warp3breenvall monsters features become aerial.
Long Battle3breenvallows only two cards to be guts during guts step.
Close Up4breenvafter guts step attack team will lose all cards
